generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone street with tram tracks and vehicle lanes is clearly visible as the main road surface.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas with curbs and benches are visible on both sides of the road, designated for pedestrians and cyclists.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with commercial storefronts and windows line both sides of the street.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking, standing, or sitting on the sidewalks and near the tram tracks.
- rider: People are riding bicycles on the tram tracks in the middle of the street.
- car: Several cars are parked along the sides of the street and a few are visible driving in the distance.
- motorcycle: A white scooter/motorcycle is parked on the right sidewalk near the curb.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the right sidewalk, and at least one is being ridden by a person.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign with a "P" symbol is visible on the right side of the street.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the street, particularly on the right side.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast and gray.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting overhead wires and traffic signs.
- traffic light: No traffic lights are visible in the image.
